definition: broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

sentences.english: In river channel regulating engineering, some success has been achieved in the application of hook groynes.

sentences.english: This line chart shows the different crime rates that occur in different seasons.
sentences.chinese: 這個折線圖顯示了不同的犯罪率，發生在不同的季節。

sentences.english: As a simple example, consider that your program manipulates polylines.
sentences.chinese: 作爲簡單的例子，考慮你的程序處理折線。

sentences.english: Position by aligning the slotted line to the hem or fold line marking. Fuse.

sentences.english: A poly-line along the edges of the features that has been successfully detected.
sentences.chinese: 一個折線沿着已成功偵破特徵的邊緣。

sentences.english: You can make two more segments just to close that polyline in a closed curve.
sentences.chinese: 您可以進行兩個部分只關閉在一個封閉的曲線，折線。

sentences.english: Once you have worked through all the values in the array, the polyline is closed off and a style is applied to the line.
sentences.chinese: 處理完數組中的值後封閉折線並應用適當的樣式。

sentences.english: The results are displayed using line charts.
To evaluate on this broken line, I will,of course, evaluate separately on each of the two segments.
sentences.chinese: 爲了在折線上計算，我當然要在兩段上分別計算。

sentences.english: The slip surface was simulated with a broken line.
sentences.chinese: 採用一條折線模擬邊坡滑動面。

sentences.english: The polyline is one basic cartography factor to express the lineal spatial entity in vector GIS.
sentences.chinese: 折線是GIS中表達線形空間實體的基本製圖要素。

sentences.english: It lies between the roll line and neck edge to help the collar roll correctly.
sentences.chinese: 它處於領折線與領圈之間，有助於衣領的正確翻折。

sentences.english: Fold the focusing bars as shown, no adhesive needed.
sentences.chinese: 依折線將對焦棒折曲，不需黏合。

sentences.english: Use interpolation algorithm to achieve a smooth dogleg.
sentences.chinese: 使用插值算法，實現折線的平滑。
